trans-unit.source: Represents a content anchor or cargo resource for an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref>.

AnnotationResource elements are used to model <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> (the data that is being annotated) and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> (the data provided by the user such as a text note) in an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>.
Through the use of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.ContentLocators%2A> an AnnotationResource can refer to the content, directly contain the content, or both.
This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This constructor is intended for annotation serializer use only.
For application needs, use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts a specified `name` parameter.
This constructor supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This constructor is intended for annotation serializer use only.
For application needs, use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts a specified `name` parameter.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that identifies this resource.
id is equal to Guid.Empty.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> class with a specified name.
The `name` parameter is provided for convenience only and no validation is performed on the string.

The AnnotationResource constructor automatically creates a unique [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource.Id%2A> property.
A name to identify this resource from other <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*> defined in the same annotation.
name is .
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref> elements contained in this resource.
The ContentLocators property will never return `null`, however the collection may be empty if the resource contains no content locators.
The collection of content locators contained in this resource.
Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects that define the content of this resource.
Contents never returns `null`; however the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> collection may be empty if the resource contains no content.
The collection of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects that define the content of this resource.
Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
See [Annotations Schema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for schema details.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of this resource.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that identifies this resource.
Gets or sets a name for this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>.

The name assigned to this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> to distinguish it from other <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos*> in the annotation.
Deserializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> from a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
The XML reader to deserialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> from.
reader is .
The serialized XML for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> is not valid.
Serializes the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref> to a specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
The XML writer to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource"></xref>.
writer is .
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnnotationType*> is not valid.
